items.description: Agent explicitly targets Shadow Ops (off-system work: WhatsApp/DMs/Sheets/memory)
items.why_it_matters: Shadow Ops is where the real operational pain lives - generic automation misses this
items.evidence: Agent 1 system prompt includes Shadow Ops signals detection: job postings mentioning manual processes, review complaints about tool gaps, community forum discussions

items.description: Agent explicitly targets Exceptions (edge cases that break normal flows)
items.why_it_matters: Exceptions cause the most rework and customer complaints - addressing them differentiates us
items.evidence: Agent 1 generates exception_hypotheses_top3 for each lead identifying likely pain points

items.description: Agent output includes at least one Shadow Ops output type
items.why_it_matters: Concrete outputs prove we understand their reality, not just generic automation
items.evidence: Outputs shadow_ops_density (0-10 score) and exception_hypotheses for every lead

items.description: Agent avoids generic automation language and uses operator-grade outcomes
items.why_it_matters: Speaking their language builds trust and differentiates from 'AI automation' generics
items.evidence: System prompt emphasizes operational pain language: 'hours lost', 'manual workarounds', 'dropped balls'

items.description: Agent outputs a single structured object (JSON schema aligned)
items.evidence: Outputs TargetPack JSON with leads array, each lead following Ops Spine Lead schema

items.description: Agent includes required IDs to write into Ops Spine
items.evidence: Each lead includes lead_id field for Ops Spine integration

items.description: Agent states assumptions clearly (no invented tools, no fake numbers)
items.evidence: fit_score includes confidence_level and breakdown showing assumptions

items.description: Happy path defined
items.evidence: Happy path: Receive niche + criteria → Research via MCP → Score leads → Return Target Pack

items.description: Top 5 exception paths defined
items.evidence: See exception_paths array below

items.description: Tool failure fallback defined
items.evidence: See tool_failure_fallbacks array below

items.description: Human escalation rules defined
items.evidence: See human_escalation_rules array below

items.description: Rollback/disable switch defined
items.evidence: Agent can be disabled via config flag in orchestrator.ts

reliability.happy_path_definition:
1. Receive niche criteria and ICP parameters
2. Query Research MCP for company data (web, LinkedIn, reviews)
3. Score each lead on 7 fit dimensions
4. Calculate Shadow Ops density
5. Generate exception hypotheses
6. Rank and return Target Pack (10-30 leads)

exception_paths.name: Insufficient leads found
exception_paths.behavior: Expand search criteria, log warning, return partial pack with explanation

exception_paths.name: MCP research tool timeout
exception_paths.behavior: Retry once, then use cached/fallback data sources

exception_paths.name: Invalid niche criteria
exception_paths.trigger: Input criteria is too broad or contradictory
exception_paths.behavior: Return clarification request with specific questions

exception_paths.name: Duplicate leads detected
exception_paths.trigger: Same company appears multiple times in sources
exception_paths.behavior: Deduplicate, merge data, use highest confidence signals

exception_paths.name: Low confidence scores across all leads
exception_paths.behavior: Flag pack as low-quality, suggest criteria refinement

tool_failure_fallbacks.fallback_action: Use cached results, reduce batch size, queue for retry
Skip LinkedIn signals, adjust confidence downward, log for manual review
Mark 'No public pain signals' rather than inventing data

human_escalation_rules.condition: All leads flagged as 'automation tourists' by filter
Niche criteria ambiguous after clarification attempt

reliability.rollback_procedure: Set AGENT_1_ENABLED=false in environment config. Requests route to manual queue.

items.description: Agent emits audit events (event_type, entity_id, actor, result)
items.evidence: Emits lead.scored, lead.researched, target_pack.generated events

items.description: Logs include enough context to answer 'what happened and why'
items.evidence: Each event includes inputs_hash, outputs_hash, score_breakdown, data_sources_used

items.description: Data retention + where logs live is specified
items.evidence: Logs stored in Ops Spine audit_events collection, 90-day retention

auditability.log_storage_location: Ops Spine audit_events collection (Google Sheets / future: dedicated DB)
auditability.retention_policy: 90 days for detailed logs, aggregates kept indefinitely

items.description: Least-privilege access model is defined
items.evidence: Agent has READ-only access to research sources, WRITE only to Lead entities

items.description: Disallowed actions are explicit
items.evidence: Cannot: modify accounts, send outbound messages, access payment data

items.description: Sensitive data handling rules exist (PII, payments, credentials)
items.evidence: PII (emails, phone) stored only in designated fields, never in logs

items.description: MCP tool permissions are specified (read/write boundaries)
items.evidence: Research MCP: read-only. No write permissions to external systems.

allowed_actions: Read company data from Research MCP
Write new Lead entities to Ops Spine

sensitive_data_rules.handling_rule: Store email/phone only in Lead.contact_info field. Never log PII. Mask in debug output.

items.description: Agent has 3-5 KPIs that prove value
items.evidence: 5 KPIs defined below

items.description: KPI definitions are measurable and tied to Ops Spine KPI entity
items.evidence: Each KPI has measurement_method and ops_spine_kpi_id

kpis.name: Lead-to-Meeting Conversion Rate
kpis.definition: % of Agent 1 leads that convert to booked meetings via Agent 2
kpis.measurement_method: Count leads with status='meeting_booked' / total leads generated

kpis.name: Shadow Ops Signal Accuracy
kpis.definition: % of leads where predicted Shadow Ops pain is confirmed in discovery
kpis.measurement_method: Agent 3 discovery confirms shadow_ops_hypothesis / total discoveries

kpis.name: Exception Hypothesis Hit Rate
kpis.definition: % of exception hypotheses that prove true in delivery
kpis.measurement_method: Agent 4 confirms exception exists / total hypotheses generated

kpis.name: Research Time Saved
kpis.definition: Hours saved vs manual research per target pack
kpis.measurement_method: Benchmark: 2 hours manual research per 10 leads. Track agent time.

kpis.name: Do-Not-Target Filter Accuracy
kpis.definition: % of filtered-out leads that would have been bad fits
kpis.measurement_method: Sample review of filtered leads quarterly

micro_commitment.action_required: Review top 3 leads from first target pack and confirm/reject fit
micro_commitment.expected_outcome: Feedback loop improves subsequent packs by 20%+ accuracy

required_items.description: Each lead includes Shadow Ops Evidence (at least 1 concrete signal)

required_items.evidence: Lead schema includes shadow_ops_signals[] array, min 1 required

required_items.why_it_matters: Pre-identifying exceptions makes discovery calls more valuable
Pattern-interrupt questions open doors that generic outreach cannot

required_items.description: Fit Score breakdown is present + confidence level assigned

required_items.why_it_matters: Focusing on right-fit leads saves everyone time
required_items.evidence: System prompt includes explicit do_not_target criteria and filters

addon_items.evidence: Target pack includes sub_niche_scores for granular targeting
Implementing counter-angle generation for top leads

final_approval.release_notes: Agent 1 v1.0 - Full Shadow Ops targeting with Research MCP integration

notes: Agent 1 is production-ready with full Shadow Ops + Exceptions targeting. Research MCP integration enables real data gathering. Next iteration: improve counter-angle generation.
